special_text:
[+1]: Scry 3, then draw a card.
[-2]: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Its controller creates a 2/2 colorless Construct artifact creature token. When that token leaves the battlefield, put the exiled card into its owner's hand.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “If a nonland, nontoken permanent would enter the battlefield under an opponent's control, it enters the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature instead.”
